verses.roman:
sārvabhaume prabhu vasāñāchena vāma-pāśe
dui bhaktera sneha dekhi' sārvabhauma hāse

synonyms: sārvabhaume—Sārvabhauma Bhaṭṭācārya; prabhu—the Lord; vasāñāchena—made to sit; vāma-pāśe—on His left side; dui bhaktera—of the two devotees; sneha—the affection; dekhi'—seeing; sārvabhauma—Sārvabhauma Bhaṭṭācārya; hāse—smiles.
translation: The Lord made Sārvabhauma Bhaṭṭācārya sit on His left side, and when Sārvabhauma saw the behavior of Svarūpa Dāmodara and Jagadānanda, he smiled.
